data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BnZwDlK7W0kQ7kNvgHR-ovW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDEVzRio94ntFSNiNdHFM-AphJd3a2EZazhO571rrqRUQ&oe=669E431C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JZU3liSauDYQ7kNvgGcOS2g&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAbAHLi0AF-J6LnuJm7lTxMukCYFfQSpQIXXRctzqXyRw&oe=669E4CA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8j-ADXfiz5oQ7kNvgGTVHFx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDJihQ_BYSIcqYUb4yZ6pSMsBmLqS3LehFsI4BMRK-X7Q&oe=669E3407)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=n0uouOdJtSYQ7kNvgFXBhxS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLQzwzQgB4Cip50H7rCDa8_028e3yD-cPfCht9WlfdUw&oe=669E26E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2wzqnd-Q2OwQ7kNvgGHID80&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAQcN2AoTVtx6Bnw2aWdjPxk7Pn1Toco8LLR0ylLdIhBg&oe=669E5358)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WHTzBNyJA2sQ7kNvgEMFuQG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCDmSidO2s-1DSMHA8qLYq5gY75FXUxrl9EB-IiGd5MJw&oe=669E4FD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XzfUTdQGkBkQ7kNvgEmmmQc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAEpeOOkCl82ErX4lPEaqv0pzYO03uU2BO5DjSD9PkKjw&oe=669E35F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vI53eNXtMcAQ7kNvgF3E8-M&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAVUOrrgenx-_L2F4a-9BTFsTUdhqw7gni3ryYTInsRnQ&oe=669E206A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=emGhnVejorAQ7kNvgGhw-6H&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD2-sBTe4Z8VKXD91sTjoHDPaRe7CKk6kdix1uuJa-sfA&oe=669E3417)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ObyS1TZfXmsQ7kNvgHWBTF5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC7JQO07Rxt5Fbaa3q7tWnTPSLFcHtF1Cb50-l8U_JK6w&oe=669E4F8C)
